page.title: 05FARMING - THREE MOSSES
page.content: Farming in this tract of land is exclusively arable, producing crops of grain, potatoes and brassicas. The land is mainly of grade 3 quality. The crops grown are mainly send to markets at Liverpool, Preston etc., for distribution in the Mid and South Lancashire areas. The brassicas are of a very high quality, some being packed at a local packing distribution centre. Farm machinery does most of the heavy work once done manually, thus areducing the number of farm workers needed. There are only 8 farms in the area aemploying mainly local people or family members. Additional works are needed in the Summer, these are usually made up of students or those on job creation schemes.
